doc.title: document environment

value.content: When the JavaScript global environment is a window or an iframe, it is called a document environment. A global environment is an environment that doesn't have an outer environment.

value.title: See also
value.content: • document environment in the HTML specification

doc.summary: When the JavaScript global environment is a window or an iframe, it is called a document environment. A global environment is an environment that doesn't have an outer environment.
